definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Therefore the LORD your God has commanded you to observe the Sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，耶和華你的神吩咐你守安息日。

sentences.english: We go to Shabbat dinner every Friday.
sentences.chinese: 每個星期五，我們都去參加安息日晚宴。

sentences.english: Christian should not break the Sabbath.
Remember that thou keep holy the sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 應記住安息日，守爲聖日。

sentences.english: Therefore it is lawful to do good on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 所以在安息日作善事是可以的。

sentences.english: 21They went to Capernaum, and when the Sabbath came, Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach.
sentences.chinese: 到了迦百家，耶穌就在安息日進了會堂教訓人。

sentences.english: 54It was Preparation Day, and the Sabbath was about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 那日是預備日，安息日也快到了。

sentences.english: Christ restored the Sabbath to its original beauty and luster.
sentences.chinese: 基督使安息日恢復它本來的美意和光澤。

sentences.english: At that time Jesus went through the grainfields on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 那時，耶穌在安息日，從麥地經過。

sentences.english: The seventh-day Sabbatarians are more faithful exegetes at this point.
sentences.chinese: 第七日安息日者在這點上是更忠實的釋經者。

sentences.english: Live like a Seventh Day Adventist.
I am a member of Xi'an Sabbath Day Adventist church.
sentences.chinese: 我是西安基督復臨復臨安息日會的一員。

sentences.english: Observe the Sabbath, because it is holy to you.
sentences.chinese: 所以你們要守安息日，以爲聖日。

sentences.english: Each of you must respect his mother and father, and you must observe my Sabbaths.
sentences.chinese: 你們各人都當孝敬父母，也要守我的安息日。

sentences.english: God has provided a Sabbath, and some must enter into it.
sentences.chinese: 上帝已經預備了安息日，只有某些人才進得去。

definition: Book of Deuteronomy/Fifth Book of Moses
Book of Leviticus/Third Book of Moses
